TopicTitle: Stock Flea Launched From Launchpad 1 Unlaunchable With Silent Flames Shooting Out of the Engine.

Articles.Content:
I'm curious to know if anyone else can reproduce this.

If I start the game, then go straight to Launchpad 1 from the KSC, and choose to launch the stock Jumping Flea, I end up in a very bugged situation.  It seems like I can only get this to happen if I follow the specific sequence I just described.

What I end up with, is a Flea sitting on the launchpad with flames already shooting out of the bottom.  No sound to go with the flames.  The go button is there and reacts to my clicks but doesn't launch the vehicle.  And more weirdness.

Here's a screenshot:

Edited June 1, 2023 by Anth12
This has been fixed as of v0.1.3.
